text: was a Japanese middleweight judoka. He won a gold medal at his only Olympics in 1972.Shinobu Sekine . sports-reference.com He was born in Oarai, Ibaraki, Japan. Sekine died on 18 December 2018 at the age of 75.1972 Olympic champion Shinobu Sekine passed away ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Japan Category:Japanese judoka
title: Shinobu Sekine
